remarks: Lemma for ~ minveco .  The convergent point of the cauchy sequence ` F ` attains the minimum distance, and so is closer to ` A ` than any other point in ` Y ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-May-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
